name: RACKET ROAD
description:
CONTROLS:

-W.A.S.D = MOVE

-MOUSE AND RIGHT-LB = AIM + SHOOT

-POINTS & PLAY:
1. TEAM-MATE COMPLETES LAP = +1 POINT 
2. SHOOT GRENADE OUT OF BOUNDS ON OPPONENTS TURF = +1 POINT
3. IF YOU SHOOT GRENADE OUT ON YOUR OWN TURF, ALSO LOSE POSSESSION = -1 POINT

END GAME:
1. FINISH 3 LAPS 
2. PLAYER WITH HIGHEST SCORE WINS

-ENJOY!!
